entry.title: We've added 20 new binary tools
entry.summary: Team Browserling keeps shipping! Last week we added 10 new random tools and and today we just added 20 new tools to our Online Binary Tools collection. We've done our job and now it's Google's job to index them and rank them well. Here are the new binary tools. Convert IPv6 to Binary Convert Binary to IPv6 Add Binary Numbers Subtract Binary Numbers Multiply Binary Numbers Encode a Negative Binary Number Decode a Negative Binary Number Convert Binary to Negabinary NAND Binary Numbers NOR Binary Numbers XNOR Binary Numbers Count Ones in a Binary Number Count Zeros in a Binary Number Invert a Binary Number Reverse a Binary Number Convert Text to Binary Convert Binary to Text Shuffle Bits in a Binary Number Rotate Bits in a Binary Number Left-shift Bits in a Binary Number Right-shift Bits in a Binary Number Next week we'll add even more tools. See you then!
